704855f-a.title: Brooklyn: Henry Street - Hamilton Avenue
704855f-a.text:
Henry Street, south from and across Hamilton Avenue, showing
hnumerous buildings being razed for the widening of Hamilton Avenue
and its conversion into Gowanus Parkway, a link in the Belt Park-
way system of roads.
View 2 is north from near Nelson Street.
P. L. Sperr  October 23, 1940
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2

705915f-a.title: Brooklyn: Nelson Street - Hamilton Avenue
705915f-a.text:
Nelson Street, east from Hariilton Avenue. Hamilton Avenue is
shown being widened as part of Prooklyn's northerly extension of
the Belt Parkway; numerous tenements were torn cown for that purpose.
Cctober 23, 1940
P. L. Sperr
